templates.title: Azure IoT Edge
templates.note:
Deploys the runtime for Azure IoT Edge 1.1 on Debian Buster.

Please note: This feature is currently a BETA version.

env.name: DEVICE_CONNECTION_STR
env.label: Device Connection String
env.description: Obtain an Azure IoT Hub device connection string by registering a new device in the Azure Device Explorer.

templates.title: easyConnect IIoT & Telemetry
templates.description: Enable your device to send data to Weidmüller easyConnect
templates.note:
Onboard your device and manage your connection to Weidmüller easyConnect. Collect data from different sources and publish it to easyConnect via the Tag Editor.

Pre-Release Only for use on UC20-WL2000-AC. Other Systems are currently not supported!


To provision the IIoT Connector, please navigate to http://[IP of this Device]:59256.
To access the Tag Editor, please navigate to http://[IP of this Device]:16702.
Make sure to use http://, not https://. These Interfaces are only available after Deployment of the stack.
